properties.areaDesc: Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 3:21AM PST until January 15 at 7:00AM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, scattered snow showers
continue this morning with additional snow accumulations of up
to one inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible
this evening through Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations
of 2 to 8 inches possible.

* WHERE...Eastern Strait of Juan de Fuca lowlands, including
Port Angeles, Sequim, and Blyn.

* WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST this
morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from this evening through
Wednesday morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions this morning. Travel
could be difficult this evening into Wednesday morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY MORNING
